name: Timeless Forest
description:
Description

Timeless Forest is a puzzle-platform game, with elements of time travel. Changing the past of the level, affects the future of the level. For example redirecting the flow of water in the past, traveling to the future in winter where the water has been frozen, and using it as a platform. This prototype focuses mostly on the graphics of the game rather than the coding. All assets are original.

Story

The story of Timeless Forest center's around a small forest spirit traveling between a monochrome future and colourful past. in order to pick up trash, clear pollution, and plant seeds for the future. The more the past is cleaned up, and more tress are planted, the future becomes cleaner and more colourful.

Assets

Unity

2.5D Platformer Engine -https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/2-5d-platformer-engine-93500

Music

Slow Motion (Trailer Music) - https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/slow-motion
